results.question: Nintendo started out as a playing card manufacturer.
The name of the main character of the video game "The Legend of Zelda", is Zelda.
English new wave musician Gary Numan founded the video game development company Facepunch Studios in March 2009.
The Ace Attorney trilogy was suppose to end with "Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney − Trials and Tribulations" as its final game.
The PlayStation was originally a joint project between Sega and Sony that was a Sega Genesis with a disc drive.
In Monster Hunter Generations, guild style is a type of hunting style.
In Heroes of the Storm, the Cursed Hollow map gimmick requires players to kill the undead to curse the enemy team.
Hidden in the files for "Mario Kart Arcade GP" is a picture of the Beslan school hostage crisis.
The video game "Fuel" has an open world that is 5,560 square miles?
